name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HaramBlur - Blur Haram & NSFW Images & Videos

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Protect your privacy and uphold Islamic values by auto detecting & blurring images and videos of unwanted or impermissible content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A free, open-source extension to help you avoid "Haram" and NSFW content and uphold the Islamic gaze protection principle by customizing your online experience. üòä.

HaramBlur utilizes Machine Learning to detect "Haram" content in images and videos, automatically blurring them to keep your browsing experience distraction-free and as "Halal" as possible. 
You can easily configure the detection type,  blur intensity, strictness level, toggle the extension on or off, and even unblur content through the interactive pop-up, and yes, it works on videos too!üòÑ

If you like the project and that it's free, please consider supporting me:
https://www.patreon.com/HaramBlur üíù
https://www.buymeacoffee.com/alganzory üíñ
			
Don't forget to follow us on twitter to get updates about the project and share the word: https://twitter.com/HaramBlur üî•

Needless to say, this extension does not track your browsing history at all, all the processing is done on your browser, in fact, the code is open source so your contributions are welcome: https://github.com/alganzory/HaramBlur
